text: __FORCETOC__ This is a list of Season 2 episodes of Cops. ‘Cops Beyond The Bust’: Spike Sets Special To Mark 1,000th Episode Of ‘Cops’ Deadline Hollywood, July 26, 2017 == Season 2 (1989–90) == *The Cops logo became lighter. == References == == External links == * * Category:Lists of American crime television series episodes
